prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (muscular middle-aged man:1.2), deeply tanned skin, large voluminous afro, thick horseshoe mustache, charismatic expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: extreme detailed skin wrinkles and pores, (visible chest hair:1.2), realistic coiled hair strands in afro, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching martial arts gi fabric:1.2), stadium lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, bald, (helmet hair:1.3), low quality, blurry, anime face
